name: Walls!
description:
**Feature by Apple under Best New Games!**

Touch to build a wall and separate the balls!

Just be careful... if a ball touches the wall before it's finished, it's game over.

Each level gets harder and harder as more balls are added.

Pick up and play anytime from where you left off. What level can you reach?

Or unlock Endless Mode for an extra challenge where it's all about strategy.

Download now and get hooked!
